mapper.insert: insert into users(userid, userpwd, username, tel, email, addr) values (#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{addr})

insert into merchant(m_userid, m_userpwd, m_username, tel, email, ma_name, m_name, m_tel, m_rnum, m_addr) values (#{m_userid}, #{m_userpwd}, #{m_username}, #{tel}, #{email},#{ma_name}, #{m_name}, #{m_tel}, #{m_rnum}, #{m_addr})
mapper.select: select * from users where userid = #{param1} and userpwd = #{param2}
select * from merchant where m_userid = #{param1} and m_userpwd = #{param2}
mapper.update: update users set username=#{username}, userpwd=#{userpwd}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, addr=#{addr} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select userid, email from users where username=#{username} and email=#{email}
